author: gdaniels
msg: deploy.xml -> deploy.wsdd

author: gdaniels
msg: Various changes to fully test the SimpleSessionHandler in a round-trip
scenario, including session timeouts.
* Enable passing a ConfigurationProvider to the Service constructor,
which lets us programattically do client-side deployment (see
TestSimpleSession for an example)
* Require a type to be set for WSDD handler deployments (ran into this
during testing)
* Improve timeout code for SimpleSessions
* Add utility methods to set the reap period and default timeout for the
SimpleSessionHandler - this should be settable via deployment options
in the future

author: rineholt
msg: Allow attachment support to be called seperately.
Headers should be case insensitive
Methods to get header information.
Have content-ID be set directly in part.
Allow attachments set as a collection to support Call.
Pass all mime headers on the wire.
